scripts.check:syntax: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='netlify/functions';(function walk(d){for(const f of fs.readdirSync(d)){const fp=d+'/'+f;const s=fs.statSync(fp);if(s.isDirectory()) walk(fp); else if(/\.(cjs|js)$/.test(fp)){ try{ new Function(fs.readFileSync(fp,'utf8')); } catch(e){ if(e.code==='ENOENT') continue; throw e; } } }})(p); console.log('Syntax OK');"
